title: Professional Portfolio
headline: I want my career to be something I can always learn from
myPitch: Hello everyone, my name is Ian. I'm currently taking the Code Fellows 301 course, and plan to take the 401 course hopefully next year. I'm currently attending Crook County High School. I am an A/B average student, and I'm enrolled in alomst all AP classes. I spend most of my free time reading, listening to music, and talking to friends. I am always willing to learn, and can take constructive criticism pretty well.
conclusion: I want to be a programmer because I like how it's a career I can always learn from, as well as something that I enjoy doing.
